WorkItem.Description: Merlin's Robe no longer appears for me in 2.2.0.  I have all the filters set correctly and it's the only item I've noticed isn't showing up.  If I change my race (under Stats) to Orc, the horde version (47604) appears.  If I change back to human though, the alliance version is still missing.

Comments.Message:
And if you use Tools | Edit Items does it exist?  If not click the add button and add it. 

Data in Rawr such as items, filters etc are the users responsibility. Rawr ships with default set of items, filters etc but its up to the user to add missing items. Select what filters they want etc. The tools to add and edit items exist a lot of people never seem to use them though.
Yes, both the horde and alliance version already exist - sorry should have mentioned that in the original report.
Try setting the filter ALL to active. Since the item requires Tailoring [450] you might need to set the Options filters (next to ALL).

If I check the filter ALL (Overrides all but Options...), then it does show up.  But that seems to be the only way to get it to appear.  Even if I'm not filtering on anything else, if ALL is not checked it doesn't appear.
Merlin's Robe is indeed crafted by a tailor but it's not BOP tailoring.  And again, the horde version seems to work fine and it's identical to the alliance version.
Seems to be similar issues with all Crusader Orb craftables. They're filtered as something not listed in the filter list, i.e. they only show up with "ALL" checked.
And BTW, these items (including Merlin's robe) do not require any skill to wear, only to craft, they should not be affected by the "Options" filter.

Yeah this was due to NULL item information being filtered into the "ALL" tab. The "ALL" tab has been temporarily removed as a fix in 2.2.21.

As it is now, all NULL items will default to the "Other" tab, so be sure to check items in the "Other" tab to see if the information can be refreshed from the other source (Wowhead/Armory).
